name: disappointingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you feel disappointed: The team played very disappointingly. It was a disappointingly dull film. See
disappointing
More examplesFewer examplesDisappointingly, he did not do much more than expected.The sandwiches were so very disappointingly bland.There was disappointingly little tension in this first programme.
